body.gathalast: Sakaṇṭakaṃ so gilati, jaccandhova samakkhikaṃ.
body.gatha1: Adaṇḍiyaṃ daṇḍayatidaṇḍiyati , daṇḍiyañca adaṇḍiyaṃadaṇḍiyana daṇḍaye ;
body.gathalast: Andhova visamaṃ maggaṃ, na jānāti samāsamaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo ca etāni ṭhānāni, aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso;
body.gathalast: Sudiṭṭhamanusāseyya, sa ve voharituvohātu marahati.
body.gatha1: Nekantamudunā sakkā, ekantatikhiṇena vā;
body.gathalast: Attaṃ mahantemahatte ṭhapetuṃṭhāpetuṃ , tasmā ubhayamācare.
body.gatha1: Paribhūto mudu hoti, atitikkho ca veravā;
body.gathalast: Etañca ubhayaṃ ñatvā, anumajjhaṃ samācare.
body.gatha1: Bahumpi ratto bhāseyya, duṭṭhopi bahu bhāsati;
body.gathalast: Na itthikāraṇā rāja, puttaṃ ghātetumarahasi.
body.gatha1: Sabbovasabbo ca loko ekatoekanto , itthī ca ayamekikā;
body.gathalast: Tenāhaṃ paṭipajjissaṃ, gacchatha pakkhipathevapakkhipetha taṃ.
body.gatha1: Anekatāle narake, gambhīre ca suduttaregambhīre suduruttare ;
body.gathalast: Pātito giriduggasmiṃ, kena tvaṃ tattha nāmari.
body.gatha1: Nāgo jātaphaṇo tattha, thāmavā girisānujo;
body.gathalast: Paccaggahi maṃ bhogehi, tenāhaṃ tattha nāmariṃ.
body.gatha1: Ehi taṃ paṭinessāmi, rājaputta sakaṃ gharaṃ;
body.gathalast: Rajjaṃ kārehikāresi bhaddante, kiṃ araññe karissasi.
body.gatha1: Yathā gilitvā baḷisaṃ, uddhareyya salohitaṃ;
body.gathalast: sukhaṃ (pī. ka.) passāmi attanaṃattaniattanāevaṃ ahampi puna sotthibhāvappattaṃ gilitabaḷisaṃ purisamiva attānaṃ passāmīti .
body.gatha1: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ baḷisaṃ brūsi, kiṃ tvaṃ brūsi salohitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ ubbhataṃ brūsi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito.
body.gatha1: Kāmāhaṃ baḷisaṃ brūmi, hatthiassaṃ salohitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Cattāhaṃ ubbhataṃ brūmi, evaṃ jānāhi khattiya.
body.gatha1: Ciñcāmāṇavikā mātā, devadatto ca me pitā;
body.gatha2: Ānando paṇḍito nāgo, sāriputto ca devatā;
body.gathalast: Rājaputto ahaṃ āsiṃ , evaṃ dhāretha jātakanti.
body.gatha1: Kāni kammāni kubbānaṃ, kathaṃ viññū parakkame;
body.gathalast: Amittaṃ jāneyya medhāvī, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito.
body.gatha1: Na naṃ umhayate disvā, na ca naṃ paṭinandati;
body.gathalast: Cakkhūni cassacakkhūnissa na dadāti, paṭilomañca vattati.
body.gatha1: Amitte tassa bhajati, mitte tassa na sevati;
body.gathalast: Vaṇṇakāme nivāreti, akkosante pasaṃsati.
body.gatha1: Guyhañca tassa nakkhāti, tassa guyhaṃ na gūhati;
body.gathalast: Kammaṃ tassa na vaṇṇeti, paññassa nappasaṃsati.
body.gatha1: Abhave nandati tassa, bhave tassa na nandati;
body.gatha2: Accheraṃacchariyaṃ bhojanaṃ laddhā, tassa nuppajjate sati;
body.gathalast: Tato naṃ nānukampati, aho sopiahāsopi labheyyito.
body.gatha1: Iccete soḷasākārā, amittasmiṃ patiṭṭhitā;
body.gathalast: Yehi amittaṃ jāneyya, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito.
body.gatha1: Kāni kammāni kubbānaṃ, kathaṃ viññū parakkame;
body.gathalast: Mittaṃ jāneyya medhāvī, disvā sutvā ca paṇḍito.
body.gatha1: Pavutthaṃ tassa sarati, āgataṃ abhinandati;
body.gathalast: Tato kelāyito hoti, vācāya paṭinandati.
body.gatha1: Mitte tasseva bhajati, amitte tassa na sevati;
body.gathalast: Akkosante nivāreti, vaṇṇakāme pasaṃsati.
body.gatha1: Guyhañca tassa akkhāti, tassa guyhañca gūhati;
body.gathalast: Kammañca tassa vaṇṇeti, paññaṃ tassapaññamassa pasaṃsati.
body.gatha1: Bhave ca nandati tassa , abhave tassa na nandati;
body.gatha2: Accheraṃacchariyaṃ bhojanaṃ laddhā, tassa uppajjate sati;
body.gathalast: Tato naṃ anukampati, aho sopipahāsopi labheyyito.
body.gatha1: Iccete soḷasākārā, mittasmiṃ suppatiṭṭhitā;
body.gathalast: Yehi mittañca jāneyya , disvā sutvā ca paṇḍitoti.
body.gatha1: Lahucitta sasāla kasanti puna, atha kāma dasakhaluṭṭhānavaro;
body.gathalast: Atha kaṇha sukosiya meṇḍavaro, padumo puna mittavarena dasāti.
